attributes.review: Took 420 days to download and when I opened it it asked for a lot of personal information like how big my toes were in cm!!! Like HELLO I live in MERICA how should I know??!!!
attributes.title: Ugghhhh

attributes.review: where do i even start?!. this app hacked my entire phone and whenever i would get onto my phone, an orange light would appear causing me to go partially blind.😵😵 That cost me millions🍊 of dollars to get fixed.!!they sent agents 🕴🏼to my house to harass my family and i to get a spray tan. IT WAS TERRIBLE. ALSO, once my family and i refused to get spray tanned, they built a gargantuan wall outside of meh house CAUSING MY FAMILY AND I TO STARVE AFTER RUNNING OUT OF MANY FOODS. 🍔🍛🥘🍤also make sure to vote harry styles for president!!🏃
attributes.title: Don’t download 🤬🤬🤬🤬😡😡😡😡

attributes.review:
So i was about to install this app on my phone but then a terrible orange 🍊 figure appeared! 🙀 he said “hey! youd better rate my app 5 stars!” so then i proceeded to rate it 1 star and i was immediately attacked! so i had to call up my boi Biggie 😎Cheese 🧀 and his squad to help attack the orange 🍊 man. the war was tough but eventually we managed to tie the orange 🍊 man down!😼 ofc we had to exercise the demon out of him, so we began to chant to the ancient ritual of pp😌. But then we had heard him say “i dont feel so good” and before we knew it, the orange 🍊 man turned into dust because he was the demon! Then out from the dust crawled Belle Delphine! 🙀😿 Then she let out a loud yell calling all the other little demons over to attack and get revenge for what happened to the big orange 🍊! The call sounded something like “SHAWTY LIKE A MELODY IN MY HEAD”. 
.
.
I then woke up from a coma. it turned out that while i was downloading the app i slipped and fell and had been in a coma for the past 69 years 🙀🙀🙀! 
however the app was still downloading so i never actually got to use it 😔
attributes.title: attacked by Belle Delphine! 🙀😿
